description.p: AppFlowy is a privacy-first open source workspace for your notes, tasks, databases, and more.

description.p: Built for individuals who care about data security and mobile experience

You own and control your personal data

ul.li: For those with no coding experience, AppFlowy enables you to create apps that suit your needs
It's built on a community-driven toolbox, including templates, plugins, themes, and more

ul.li: Faster, more stable with support for offline mode
It's also better integrated with different devices
Moreover, AppFlowy enables users to access features and possibilities not available on the web
